equation
Class Equivalences

java.lang.Object
  equation.Equivalences

public class Equivalences
extends java.lang.Object

A map of equivalent variables. Any equation can be transformed into a system consisting of a single quadratic equation and a set of variable equivalences.

Method Summary
 Equivalences duplicate()
          Makes a new Equivalence that is a copy of this one.
 Variable get(Variable v1)
          Get a variable that v1 is bound to.
 java.util.Iterator iteratorVariables()
          Gets an Iterator over the set of key Variables.
 void put(Variable v1, Variable v2)
          Add a binding to say that v1 = v2.
 int size()
          Get the number of variable equivalences in this Equivalence instance.
